name: Sublind
description:
This game is a 2D side-scrolling underwater game made over 48hrs during a game jam.

The premise is that you control a submarine in the very deep ocean but it's too dark and misty to navigate. In order to avoid obstacles such as rocks, you must use a forward facing sonar. As you get closer to the object, the sonar beeps get more frequent.

Made in Game Maker Studio
